item.title: What is the code for unlimited special and ::jail/::unjail?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

         if (otherPIndex != -1) {
             client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
             p.toX = 2827;
             p.toY = 3344;
             p.action = 0;
             p.sM(
                     "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
             sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
         } else { 
            sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
         }
     } catch (Exception e) { 
         sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail..");
		}
	}	
}

}[/code]

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

         if (otherPIndex != -1) {
             client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
             p.toX = 2933;
             p.toY = 3285;
             p.action = 1;
             p.sM(
                     "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
             sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
         } else { 
            sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
         }
     } catch (Exception e) { 
         sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
     	         }
 	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: What is the code for unlimited special and ::jail/::unjail?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I assume Your Using Delta.

Jail [code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }

}[/code]

Unjail: [code] if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2827;
		p.toY = 3344;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail..");
            }[/code]

Spec: if(command.startsWith("unlimited") && playerRights > 2) { specialAmount += 5000; specAttack();

Read full topic
